name: Never Trust a Bird
description:
You wake up in an unfamiliar underground lab, where you are told that you are the lab-rat of crazed scientist, Professor James Arbuckledorf. Soon after, a bird comes to you through the vents offering a way out. With no choice but to trust him, you make your way through painstaking platforming in an attempt to grasp freedom, all the while honing your newfound superpower, given to you by one of Arbukledorf's concoctions. Will you make it out of this prison, or are you being misled by a sinister feathered fiend? -Made in 72 hours for the BenBonk game jam.

PS: If you get stuck feel free to check out the linked video and see how to continue. In the video the music is way too loud so you can't really hear me.
